iron_banded_wooden_roundshield.description: A well designed wooden shield banded by iron.

pink_rose_bush.description: Can be harvested for making dyes
pink_rose_bush.unripe_description: This plant has been harvested and has not grown back yet

pink_rose_bush_seed_ghost.description: Once planted, it will grow into a beautiful bush

pink_rose_bush_sprout.description: Just needs some time and care.

pink_rose_bush_bud.description: Its almost there!  Look, it has buds!

red_rose_bush.description: Can be harvested for to make dyes
red_rose_bush.unripe_description: This plant has been harvested and has not grown back yet

red_rose_bush_seed_ghost.description: Once planted, it will grow into a beautiful bush

red_rose_bush_sprout.description: Just needs some time and care.

red_rose_bush_bud.description: Its almost there!  Look, it has buds!

iron_pole_axe.flavor: Shield? What shield? I have REACH!!!

steel_pole_axe.flavor: I shall keep mine enemies at more than arm's length.

gaelic_claymore.flavor: I see you have a wee little knife; don't get too close.

wooden_roundshield.flavor: It may not look like much, but I'm still alive!

iron_banded_wooden_roundshield.description: A Wooden Roundshield banded in Iron
iron_banded_wooden_roundshield.flavor: I wonder how bad it would hurt to be hit by this.

stone_seax.flavor: I can now defend my home, my family, and my town!
